scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Louis Auchincloss, New York, writes to Robie Macauley, the fiction editor of Playboy, 1969 November 6, thanking him for the purchase of "Black Shylock" and "The sacrifice" and mentioning that these stories will be published in September 1970. In a letter, 1969 November 10, Auchincloss encloses a revised version of "The sacrifice."

did.unittitle: Letter of Louis S. Auchincloss to Robie Macauley 1969 Nov 6

scopecontent.p: This letter expresses his appreciation for Macauley's purchase of his two stories, "Black Shylock" and "The Sacrifice," and informs him that they will appear in a volume of twelve short stories to be published in 1970.

did.unittitle: Letter from L.S.A. to R.M. 1969 Nov 10

scopecontent.p: This letter encloses a revised version of "The Sacrifice," which will be used in his volume of short stories.
